allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Capacitor Android packaging with locally-bundled dependencies

Package the PWA as an Android APK via Capacitor. All CDN dependencies
\(React, ReactDOM, PropTypes, Recharts, Babel, Tailwind CSS\) are
downloaded into www/lib/ so the app works offline in the WebView.
Also fixes the distorted Save icon SVG path in the www/ copy.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add data migration, logs persistence, and redesigned stats page

Migrate localStorage data from older app versions \(v1-v4\) into v5 on
load with deduplication. Auto-save in-progress logs so workout data
survives browser close. Fix clearData\(\) to only remove app-specific
keys instead of wiping all localStorage. Replace broken single-exercise
stats view with per-exercise ComposedCharts showing dual-axis weight/reps
averages and individual set scatter points.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
